landingpage_cap_1: Join us and let's inspire to everyone
reg_cap_1: By clicking Sign up, You agree with
error_auth_content_3: Your account has been successfully verified, please login to your account.
reg_success_content_1: Thank you, your account has been successfully created. Please check your inbox and click on the link sent to confirm this account.
reg_success_content_2: The path is valid for 60 minutes.
login_mess_1: Please enter your email or username
verify_mail_content_1: Your account has not been validated for Email, please check your inbox
verify_mail_content_2: If you do not receive our mail or the link has expired please click the button below to request a confirmation Email
resendemail_content_1: We have sent again a confirmation email to your inbox. Please check your inbox or Spam mailbox and perform your account authentication. Thank you for being here with us !
referrel_modal_1: Send the link below to everyone
error_2: Usernames cannot have special characters except dots, and must be between 6-20 characters
mat_khau_nhap_lai_khong_khop: The password entered does not match
mat_khau_qua_ngan: Password is too short, we require password more than 8 characters
2fa_notifi: our account does not have enabled 2FA protection, please do the following operation to activate the 2FA for the first time. After activating your wallet 2FA will automatically activate and you will receive reward immediately
tai_app: - Install Google Authenticator on the mobilephone
step_2_content: Use Google Authenticator to scan the QR code above
step2_content_1: - If you can't use a QR code, use the above sequence number
wallet_un: - Your wallet has not been activated, to activate, press the button below to install 2FA. After installing 2FA your wallet automatically activated
wallet_un_1: - You will receive a token after activating the wallet
